utill

Class Cin

  • java.lang.Object
    • utill.Cin

  • public final class Cin
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that allows int, long, double, float, char and String to be read from an input stream.
    If a fault arises when reading the value, exceptions will be caught, and a defult value will be returned. 
       Lit: R.Winder & G. Roberts: Developing Java Software. Wiley. 1998, p.788.
    Version:
    1.0; - 17th Jan. 1999
    Author:
    Hans Sondergaard and R. Winder

      Read a double value from standard input.

      Read an int value from standard input.

    • Method Detail

      • readInt

        public static int readInt()
        Read an int value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is 0.

      • readLong

        public static long readLong()
        Read a long value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is 0L.

      • readDouble

        public static double readDouble()
        Read a double value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is 0.0D.

      • readFloat

        public static float readFloat()
        Read a float value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is 0.0F.

      • readChar

        public static char readChar()
        Read a char value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is ' ', that is SPACE.

      • readString

        public static java.lang.String readString()
        Read a String value from standard input.
        Returns:
        the read value; - default return value is "", that is empty String.
